traits.name: Action Surge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Drannin takes an additional action on his turn.

traits.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when Drannin hits with it (included in the attack).

traits.name: Dwarven Resilience
entries: Drannin has advantage on saving throws against poison.

traits.name: Indomitable (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Drannin can reroll a saving throw that he fails. He must use the new roll.

traits.name: Second Wind (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: Drannin can use a bonus action to regain 16 ({@dice 1d10 + 11}) hit points.

traits.name: Special Equipment
entries: Drannin wears a control amulet for his {@creature shield guardian} (see the Monster Manual) and a {@item ring of cold resistance}. He also carries a {@item potion of frost giant strength}.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: Drannin makes three attacks with his greataxe.

actions.name: Greataxe
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 17 (2d12 + 4 damage) slashing damage.
